chunks.chunk_text: Hi there, you are now listening to 15 Minutes.Today, you are now listening to John, and today being a Wednesday, you guys know it's 15 Minutes Cafe Today.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: Let's get on with today's 15 Minutes Cafe, and we have a person that you guys have been asking for for a while, and let's welcome back Angel.Hello, this is Angel.That's right, Angel, where have you been the last two months?I was so busy with my promotion test.Okay, so there was a promotion test?Yes.Okay, and how long did that take?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: Actually just like two hours, but you need to prepare it for like two months.Alright, so it's a two hour test that you had to prepare for two months.Yes.Why two months?Because you need to pass the knowledge test, and the knowledge test covers everything.You know, I'm a mechanic some right now.I know how to fix the airplane, so that's in our test.Okay, so part of your test involves knowing the mechanics of an airplane.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: And now you can fix a plane.Well, tweak a plane, or perhaps to debug, troubleshoot, whatever you want to call it.Yeah, but more importantly, because it's going to be higher positions, so you need to know more about the company, so now I have to know about our loyalty program, you know, those members, all the beneficial things, and also need to know the, I mean, the airport, the facilities of the airports, and so many things like that.Very, very nice.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: Okay, so that's a lot of aspects, so I need to study for two months.Very soon in the coming episode, we might get you again to talk about some of the interesting trivia that you picked up in your test.But today we're not going to go there, because it's still sort of fresh in your memory.We don't want to give you PTSD.Right?We want you to recover first, and then you can, we don't want you to keep reviewing about your test prep.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: Right.Super long haul flight.Super long haul.Okay, ultra long haul.And let's quickly define what a long haul flight is.

chunks.chunk_text: South Africa via Hong Kong is a 16-hour long haul flight.So to me, a long haul flight is 16 hours.So what is a long haul flight to a flight attendant?So basically, long haul flight is a flight above 8 hours is considered a long haul flight.8 hours?Okay.So if a flight is more than 16 hours, that's how we call the ultra long haul flight.Oh, so I
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: experienced the ultra long haul flight.Okay.The one you are taking via Hong Kong, so that means that you have transferred the flight, right?Yes.Okay.So then it's one hour and a half, and then 12 hours, right?12 hours from Hong Kong to, so that's long haul.A long haul plus show flights.Ah, okay.So a short one, yes.So I had to transit, right?A short one to Hong Kong, and then I had to transit to a long haul.Do you prefer like direct flight or

chunks.chunk_text: transit one stop?No direct flight ever.We don't have a direct flight.So it's either via Hong Kong or Singapore.Ah, right, right, right.Too much, right?Too long.But in terms of pricing, let me tell you, Singapore airline, if you fly via Singapore, it's almost 30 to 35% more than any other flights to Johannesburg.Wow.So back in the day, if you hear any of our friends
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: flying Singapore, they come from ultra wealthy families, you know what I mean?Ah, those rich families.Yeah, rich families.Yes.Ah, okay.If you fly something like Cathay, it's very, very good.It's a good holiday, okay?But how about even for economic class, it's still that pricey in Singapore airline?Yes, yes, yes.Ah, irregardless of the class.Forget business class.Okay, it's too much.In our lives,

chunks.chunk_text: even till today, business class is not a class that I would book for myself.You understand what I mean?I don't have that kind of budget.I'm sorry.We don't have a need to travel business.No, I'm sorry.I'm going to be very blunt.Just no budget.I need it, but I have no budget.Okay.All right.We talk about business class later.All right.Yes.So long haul flights.And I think that ties in.Well, it's still relevant.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's still relevant here because when you fly a long haul flight, like a 16-hour flight, when you make a 16-hour trip, a 20-hour trip, a 24-hour trip, if you fly business class, at least you get to raise your legs.And you have a flat bed to sleep on.Obviously, it depends on the airplane you take, but, you know, mostly flat, right?If you're not flat, you can still raise your legs.Right.However, with economy class, there's no such thing as raising your leg, right?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: If you have sufficient leg room to get out of your seat, it's a good day.And I pray for you.Oh, my God.You know, whenever I operate this 16-hour flight or even just a flight more than eight hours, I was wondering how could people survive that long without walking around the cabin?When you are much younger and shorter, you survive.Really?Okay.So my first trip back to Taiwan was

chunks.chunk_text: when I was 12.You know, there was enough leg room for me on economy class because I was still growing.I was still growing.So I could even cross my legs, you know, watching TV.I could cross my legs and, I mean, I could stretch and the seats were comfortable for me.For you at that time.And then my first trip that I took by myself and my first plane ride that I purchased for myself

chunks.chunk_text: visiting family in Taiwan, that trip, I was too old.Too old?To cross your leg?Too old to cross my leg.And also, I sort of overestimated my ability to adapt.Adapt to the long flight?Yes.So when you're between the age of 12 and 16, flying is cool.And then when you get over 18 and you start flying and you start facing leg room issues.

chunks.chunk_text: And then you start facing perhaps the next seat passenger is a bigger guy than you.But it always happened.Then for 16 hours, that 16 hours, you tend to just not enjoy it.You tend to just want to arrive on the other side.Think about it.When you were kids, you get to watch the movie for 16 hours long and no one will stop you from that.Yes.But as an adult, wow.Okay.So imagine if you're sitting in the middle seat.

chunks.chunk_text: Yes.There's nowhere you can go.Yes.And I hate that.And I'm sorry.Yes.I can imagine that.So long haul flights.Long haul flights.Yes.And that's when you wished you had money to buy business class.I know.But the price is insanely expensive.I can tell.Yes.It's insanely expensive.It's insanely expensive.You know, sometimes I will be assigned to work in business class.Yeah.And at that time, I didn't know that.How much money do they have?Expensive the seats were?Yeah.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: I thought come on.This passenger, they're so demanding.They request everything.But now I know their price.They want to eat and drink and they want some holy light to be shun on them.Yes.I will give them whatever they want because they really deserve it.They have to pay a lot.Yes.And think about it.Post pandemic now, can you imagine the ticket prices?I heard the price has tripled.Tripled before.I don't know how people can afford business class today.

chunks.chunk_text: But I hear all your business classes are booked now.Full of occupied.Overbooked every day.You know, some people, they even have...We heard upgrade all the time, right?But now, there are a lot of passengers.No such thing as upgrade.Downgrade it.Because too many passengers passed the book for the business class.So they have no seat then.They have to go back to the economy.Wow.So good for them.They're all making money.I still can't...I still don't have the budget for business class.There are still so many rich people in the world.No.You know what?

chunks.chunk_text: When you used to get an upgrade, you go up, right?You go from economy class to premium economy or premium economy to business.Jump to the business class.Right?Very nice.And then if you're lucky, you sometimes get to go to the first class.If you're super lucky.Wow.You have to be super lucky.If you're super lucky.But now today, there's a sure win that you will get downgraded to the economy class bathroom.You can sit in the bathroom.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: Because economy class is also full.Right?The bathrooms are available.Available, yes.But if the price is half price, I will consider sitting there.You can occupy the bathroom.For 16 hours, I don't mind.That's enough for long haul flights.Now here's the thing we have to talk about.I saw this article that says, how do you make a long haul flight more comfortable and growing up?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: I just mentioned when you're 12 to 16, cool.No problem.There's no such thing as having to make yourself comfortable.Right.You are always comfortable anyway.I was always comfortable until you are fully grown.Then it's not comfortable.Then you have just enough leg room to move in and out of your seat.And then that 16 hours, you sit in that position.And I remember I was at the age of what?Maybe 2021 when I took the flight.

chunks.chunk_text: By myself back to Taiwan.And that was the first time I actually have leg cramps and I have knee pains.Knee pain.Yes, because for six hours, my knee was in the same position.And then also the minute I stood up, I think I stood up very quickly and I got leg cramps from sitting from that trip.And then I realized, oh my gosh, I'm 20 something.I'm early in my early 20s and I feel like an old guy.So you didn't walk around the cabin on that trip?

chunks.chunk_text: How?I mean 16 hours, how do you want to walk?The aisles are very narrow.Yeah, then you have to excuse yourself to the galley and stretch yourself.That's very important.I suppose you can, but again, yeah, when you're alone and you got a big guy next to you.Ah, true.Or why you just go back to go to the jet galley and find some flight attendant to talk to.They're bored anyway.I wasn't that much of an extrovert.I was very shy.I was worried that

chunks.chunk_text: my food were going to get poisoned because I actually disrupted what's going on with the flight attendants.Flight attendants, during a long flight, they're always bored.So if you talk to them, they might be happy.No, but I hear most of the time I would hear flight attendants chatting amongst themselves.Right, you can join them.Right, I wasn't that much of an extrovert.Luckily, you didn't have the thing we call DVT, the deep man from Mobis.

chunks.chunk_text: What the heck is that?The DVT.It's called deep man from Mobis.So once you keep the same positions for too long and then your blood cannot circulate in your body, so you got the DVT.That's called the economy syndrome, right?I call it not having enough money syndrome.Same, same, same.No budget syndrome.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: No budget syndrome.So how to prevent this?Because DVT can be escalate that to some...Cause complications because you are missing circulation.Right, you might fainted because of that.So the best thing to prevent to it so that you have to walk around the cabin.So that's what I always emphasize.Don't stay on your seat for 16 hours.Yeah, but there are almost 200 to 300 people on the flight.They can't all get up and

chunks.chunk_text: just walk around.It's not musical chairs.You understand what I mean?You can't play musical chairs.Or it's not like a school.The teacher uses the commonplace music.Can everybody stand up and exercise?We still need to get more money to go to the front, right?Anyway, so long haul flight.So now the key question is how do we make long haul flights more comfortable?And this is what the article is talking about.

chunks.chunk_text: comfortable at all.So during the 16-hour flights, you cannot sleep on that.And then if you want to go to the toilet, think about the floor.There's so much germ and urine on the floor.And then if you wear one of those floral length trousers, think about your trousers.They would end up on the floor, right?Okay.I mean, easily to touch the ground.That mental picture back there was not very nice.Terrible.So don't wear anything that drags on the ground.

chunks.chunk_text: Let's just put it this way.So comfortable clothing does not mean you wear your pajamas.All right, guys?Don't do that?Some people do wear pajamas in flight.I think that's acceptable.You think pajamas are cool?Okay.Comfortable.I'm not saying it's cool, but it's comfortable.Acceptable.Yeah, I think people could...Anyway, just 16 hours, you might spend like 8 or 10 hours sleeping, if you're lucky.So shoes, of course, when we talk about comfort,

chunks.chunk_text: The in-flight entertainment, you get the remote and you start turning on all the different movies, turning off all the different movies, fast forward them.And then you go and check out all the sitcoms and then you play the in-flight entertainment, the one or two games available on the system.Use up everything.And then that's your first four hours of your trip.Only four hours.The first four hours.And then you strategically decide how much do I want to sleep?

chunks.chunk_text: And how much do I want to play?Tough question.Yes.And then to counter my jet lag, to counter my jet lag, I remember I remember I don't know where I learned this from or somebody told me this way back.I can't remember.But the trip that I had jet lag went back to Taiwan.I literally did not sleep.That's what I did.I did not sleep a wink.And that's how I fought my jet lag.However, once I landed,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: it was like as if I'm drunk.I was not walking straight.Because you haven't slept for maybe almost 20 hours.Yeah, for me, because I live in Bloemfontein, so I have to fly an hour to Johannesburg.So that morning I have to fly to Johannesburg and I have to stay in Johannesburg airport for another three hours to get checked in, to get ready and then get on the flight.So technically I haven't
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: slept for almost 20 hours.20 hours, right?Yeah.Oh wow.Yeah.That's the length I can back and forth Australia.One round trip already.Really?20 hours.20 hours.20 hours.Yeah.Oh my god.You're like a zombie after the flight.Yes.So I couldn't walk straight.I felt very, very much like a drunk.But when you arrive Taipei, it's only in the afternoon, right?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: In the afternoon.In the afternoon.So you can't prepare yourself and then sleep early in the night?Yes.So you don't have jet lag when you back to Taiwan?No.No.Okay.That's good.That's good.But the few hours that you land and you go through immigration.You just want to kill yourself.And then you take the bus.So once you're on the city bus, on the airport bus, back then there was no airport express like today.No airport MRT.Now it's the airport bus.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: And honestly, you can't sleep on the airport bus.You're not that tired.You're still sort of half drunk.And still woozy from your whole trip.And you're not sleeping.So by the time I would arrive at my aunt's house, it would usually be 8 o'clock or 9 o'clock in the evening.In the evening.And then you grab something to eat.And then it's already past your...It's already midday.It's still midday.You know, 10 o'clock.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: So I don't sleep.And then I sleep about 12.I think 12, 1 o'clock.Because that's 6 o'clock in South Africa.5, 6 o'clock in South Africa.Still quite early to sleep.So that's your first day is screwed.Done.Of course.You can't think properly.You can't talk properly.You're just like, okay, yeah.I'm back.The arrival date, you just think it as a rest day.So don't make any plan on that date.On the arrival date.So that's what I know.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: I normally do.So during a long flight, normally I don't sleep during the flight.Or maybe 2 hours.2 hours for 16 hours.And it's not comfortable sleeping anyway.Because you're not sleeping.You're sitting in an awkward position.You're just taking a nap, I would say.It's not really sleeping.There's no deep sleep.It's very light.And then because people are walking down the aisle, up the aisle.And then, you know, the guy next to you trying to get to the bathroom and all that.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: So even though you want to sleep.So some people, they would choose the.So you prefer the window seat or the aisle seat when you get to choose.If I'm in the middle aisle.If I had only to able to choose the middle part.The middle part.The central part.Then it'll be aisle seat.And then if I have to sit either on the left or the right, it'll be the window seat.And then obviously, once I was fully grown, then it's all aisle seat.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: Because sometimes I stick my leg out.Because I really get major knee cramps.So really need to do that.But one thing about the aisle seat that is pretty annoying is that when the window seat passengers they want to go to the toilet.Then you still have to wake up even though you are already in sleeping.I'm fine with that because anything to get rid of the knee cramp.I find the knee cramp more annoying.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's super annoying.And then the next point here.What about in-flight entertainment?I talked a little bit about in-flight entertainment.And then back in the day when I was still like a kid.We flew.No entertainment.In-flight entertainment was the best entertainment ever.The in-flight TV was the best entertainment ever.But today we have switch.We have phones.We have all sorts of entertainment.And then also we have very fancy headphones.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: So you can prepare your entertainment in advance.And you can download your Netflix on your phone or your iPad.And you can watch it.So I don't know what the in-flight

chunks.chunk_text: entertainment situation looks like now.But I'm sure we are not short of entertainment today.Oh.You can bring your own Bluetooth gear and then connect to the in-flight entertainment.And you still can watch your in-flight TV or in-flight movie.We have Bluetooth.Yeah.We have Bluetooth.That is super cool.OK.Super interesting.Now the next thing I heard recently is some flights.Some long haul flights.For an extra fee.You get
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: Wi-Fi.Of course.Even Taipei to Hong Kong we have Wi-Fi.Taipei to Hong Kong you get Wi-Fi.Yeah.So there's no point in really enjoying the in-flight entertainment anymore.Right?Because if I got Wi-Fi I don't need to.I can stream anything I want.I can watch Netflix.I wouldn't say it's a good idea.You know Wi-Fi only works sometimes if the weather is not good.So it interferes your Wi-Fi connections.And in-flight always encounter the trouble is that passengers are always asking me
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: I just pay for the Wi-Fi.Why couldn't I use it?Because of the poor connection.Sometimes it happens.OK.So Wi-Fi connectivity is available.Well Wi-Fi connectivity is available.But Internet is not available.Because of the connection issue.Yes.You get Wi-Fi you don't get Internet.Yes.Yes.I'm sorry.But the price.Let me tell you the price.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: If you want to use it for an hour in my company.It's 10 US dollars for an hour.Not bad.OK.It's not great.It's not bad.It's not bad.And then for duration of the flight for 16 hours.20 US dollars.It's actually affordable if you really use the Wi-Fi to send the email or watch the movie online.But there's also a risk.

chunks.chunk_text: I think it's applies to all the airline that Wi-Fi connectivity is not a guarantee.It's not 100% guarantee.Still.OK.So it's not as good as the Wi-Fi you get at home.Let's put it this way.So you must be mentally prepared for that.Let's put it this way.Right.OK.So the next step here.And I think I do this a lot.Especially now that I'm fully grown.You gotta stay hydrated.

chunks.chunk_text: 好,這是我長大後的小提示有人告訴我,你只要能讓你的航空航空快樂就是要一直追求酒、酒、啤酒、任何類似的酒精,它們可以讓你過了16小時但當我小時候的時候,我完全不明白
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: 但當我長大後,我心想,哇,這真是個很棒的想法對,這真是個很棒的想法因為我的膝蓋,我的腿蓋和其他部位,我心想,我的天啊如果我沒有醉酒,我真的會把自己喝醉了用酒來補充所有類似的酒精我只會把我的航空航空補充到16小時我見過喝醉的乘客在航空上

chunks.chunk_text: 對,我認為他們在航空上能夠讓酒精在航空上運作如果你是一個喝醉的乘客在地上,但可能你沒有在航空上因為我聽說,酒精可能會有更強烈的影響在地上可能你可以在地上喝一到四杯酒,但可能在航空上只能喝兩杯

chunks.chunk_text: 然後你就會被淘汰對,你會成為一個航空乘客對,你會成為一個航空乘客所以不要喝酒,不要喝酒,喝水好,所以這是一個問題這篇文章說,整個想法就是要保持保持飲食,而不是把自己喝了啤酒和酒精補充你知道為什麼嗎?因為它說,喝酒和咖啡,咖啡飲品

chunks.chunk_text: 10 10 12 20包裝所以你們不必去洗手間紙去想想健身對 請做這個好 太好了所以這是第一點要自己舒服如何穿舒服的衣服我覺得這是一件事 必須要做第二點 要穿正確的衣服耳機或者是支撐脖子腿旋律 腳枕 等等的再一次 別說我

chunks.chunk_text: 我不需要穿正確的衣服 我其實很輕鬆的旅行然後睡眠計劃上所以如果你們在戰鬥如果你們在戰鬥上在不同的時間區睡眠的話 肯定是不會睡覺或者是你們可以在睡覺上 到你們了你們可以在那裡睡眠計劃上然後當然要提前準備娛樂我想今天有很多娛樂所以一定要帶著你的小iPad或者iPhone去下載所有你想看的Netflix節目在你的手機上準備好
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: 然後當然最大的提示給我就是要保持乾淨保持遠離酒精和咖啡飲料還有很多咖啡和咖啡喝多點水也不要在飛機上洗手前洗澡不要在飛機上洗手前洗澡但根據這篇文章他們建議洗澡前在飛機上洗澡如果你們在商業課上對 我覺得寫這篇文章他們必須要去
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: 如果你們在飛機上洗澡你需要洗澡前離開飛機上我同意但如果你們在飛機上經過經濟學就要離開洗手間就要離開洗手間對 我也會推薦這個對 洗澡後要把手液洗乾淨你直播一下就在那個座位上不要去廁所不要去洗手間 不要

chunks.chunk_text: 好,今天我們有很多時間了,我們要開始了,這星期是一個特別的星期,就是March。第一週March,那是什麼呢?是我們國際女生日。女生日,March 8。女生日。那你怎麼慶祝女生日呢?購物。購物。購物。購物。購物。購物。購物。購物。購物。

chunks.chunk_text: 我們是,那不是好嗎?那不是好。那不是好,那是一個 stereotype。那是一個 stereotype。那就是我做的。或者我們把自己當成一個好蛋糕。那就是了。所以今天是一個對自己的慶祝,而知道,你知道,這些特質,而理解這些女生的特質。然後慶祝所有女生的強壯等等。如果去購物,那是強制了商品。那是強制了商業。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.207_ 給愛旅遊的你一些長途飛行生存小撇步 How to survive long-haul flights.json

chunks.chunk_text: 不是女生,不是。但是我從購物中得到喜悅。是的,喜悅。那就是了。各位,今天是女生日,那是你們的日子。那是我們女生的日子,那就是慶祝女生的慶祝。幸福的妻子,幸福的生活。幸福的生活。那是一句話,我從來沒有改變過。那就是生活的方式了。各位,謝謝大家的參與。然後,我們會在下一集見面。
